<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/chat/channel/:id"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add a new channel

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"description":"Id of the object, this can be a mongo Id but also a plain string (backwards-compatibility).","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"description":"Channel name","type":"string"},"desc":{"description":"Description of the channel","type":"string"}},"title":"chatChannel"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
